name: rag-insights-engine
description: Advanced RAG Insights Engine with Hybrid Search - A production-ready system for generating intelligent insights from document collections

scripts.smoke-test: npm run test && echo 'âœ… All tests passed - RAG Engine is ready!'
scripts.setup: npm install && echo 'ðŸ“‹ Next steps:' && echo '1. Copy .env.example to .env and fill in your values' && echo '2. Run: npm run bootstrap' && echo '3. Run: npm run deploy' && echo '4. Run: npm run smoke-test'
scripts.help: echo 'Available commands:' && echo '  npm run setup     - Initial setup' && echo '  npm run bootstrap - Set up database' && echo '  npm run deploy    - Deploy Edge Functions' && echo '  npm run test      - Run functionality tests' && echo '  npm run smoke-test - Run all tests' && echo '  npm run dev       - Start local development'
